description: Table T(n,k) giving number of elements of order k in dihedral group D_{2n} of order 2n, n >= 1, 1<=k<=g(n), where g(n) = 2 if n=1 else g(n) = n.
comments: Note that D_2 equals the cyclic group of order 2.
formula: If k<>2 and k does not divide n, this number is 0; if k<>2 and k divides n, this number is phi(k), where phi is the Euler totient function; if k=2, this number is n for odd n and n+1 for even n.
mathematica: t[n_, k_] /; k != 2 && ! Divisible[n, k] = 0; t[n_, k_] /; k != 2 && Divisible[n, k] := EulerPhi[k]; t[n_, 2] := n + 1 - Mod[n, 2]; Flatten[Table[t[n, k], {n, 1, 14}, {k, 1, If[n == 1, 2, n]}]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 19 2012, from formula *)
author: _Roger Cuculière_, Oct 29 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Oct 30 2000
